statements: DELETE FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE total_spending > 10000 AND last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount < 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP();
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM customer_categories WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE age > 30)
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 60 AND customer_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id IN (SELECT recommendation_id FROM recommendations WHERE LENGTH(recommendation_text) < 20);
